choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for 7 days.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews
Here is an example of a 7-day meal plan that meets your dietary restrictions:
Day 1: Breakfast - Oatmeal with fruit and nuts (without almonds, pistachios, or cashews)Lunch - Grilled chicken salad with vegetablesDinner - Baked salmon with sweet potato and green beansSnacks - Apple slices with nut butter
Day 2: Breakfast - Greek yogurt with fruit and granola (without honey)Lunch - Turkey burger on a whole wheat bun, side saladDinner - Grilled shrimp skewers with vegetablesSnacks - Carrot sticks with hummus
Day 3: Breakfast - Smoothie bowl with frozen fruit and nut milk (without honey)Lunch - Quinoa salad with grilled chickenDinner - Baked tofu with brown rice and steamed broccoliSnacks - Rice cakes with avocado
Day 4: Breakfast - Omelet with vegetables and whole grain toast (without almonds, pistachios, or cashews)Lunch - Grilled chicken sandwich on whole wheat bread, side saladDinner - Baked salmon with sweet potato mash
Day 5: Breakfast - Greek yogurt with fruit and granola (without honey)Lunch - Turkey burger on a whole wheat bun, side saladDinner - Grilled shrimp skewers with vegetablesSnacks - Apple slices with nut butter
Day 6: Breakfast - Smoothie bowl with frozen fruit and nut milk (without honey)Lunch - Quinoa salad with grilled chickenDinner - Baked tofu with brown rice and steamed broccoliSnacks - Rice cakes with avocado
Day 7: Breakfast - Oatmeal with fruit and nuts (without almonds, pistachios, or cashews)Lunch - Grilled chicken salad with vegetablesDinner - Baked salmon with sweet potato and green beansSnacks - Apple slices with nut butter
Remember to stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water throughout the day. Enjoy your healthy meal plan!
